verses.roman:
ācāryere sthāpiyāche kariyā īśvara
ithe doṣa nāhi, ācārya--daivata īśvara

synonyms: ācāryere—unto Śrī Advaita Ācārya; sthāpiyāche—he established; kariyā—mentioning; īśvara—as the Supreme Personality of Godhead; ithe—in this; doṣa—fault; nāhi—there is not; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; daivata īśvara—He is actually the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: "He has established Advaita Ācārya as an incarnation of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. There is nothing wrong in this, for He is indeed the Lord Himself.
